villainQuotes.quote: Chaos is fair. It doesn't play favorites.
villainQuotes.author: The Joker

villainQuotes.quote: Power is only given to those who are prepared to lower themselves to pick it up.
villainQuotes.author: Ra's al Ghul

villainQuotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
villainQuotes.author: Lex Luthor

villainQuotes.quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
villainQuotes.author: Darth Vader

villainQuotes.quote: The world only makes sense if you force it to.
villainQuotes.author: Frank Underwood

villainQuotes.quote: I don't want to be a product of my environment. I want my environment to be a product of me.
villainQuotes.author: Frank Costello

villainQuotes.quote: There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
villainQuotes.author: Lord Voldemort

villainQuotes.quote: I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks.
villainQuotes.author: Walter White
